content.prompt: Complete the following method which takes a list of integers as a parameter and returns a new list of the integers, omitting any that are less than 0.For example:noNeg([1, -2]) → [1]noNeg([-3, -3, 3, 3]) → [3, 3]noNeg([-1, -1, -1]) → []
